data.title: Limited Express
data.meta_description: Information about SEIBU RAILWAY's Limited Express is provided. Take the SEIBU RAILWAY and COME SEE SEIBU!
data.text:
Refund policy

Before use

Tickets can be refunded if they have not been used and it is before the departure time designated on the ticket.

Handling Fee

100yen

Refund Amount

(Purchase amount) â€“ (handling fee) = Amount of refund

If you lose your ticket

If you lost a ticket, you need to purchase the ticket once again. Please ask for a certificate of double payment at a station so that you can claim a refund with the certificate when the lost ticket is found. In such cases, we will give a refund after deducing the predetermined amount of the handling fee.

Handling Fee

100yen (220yen for a connecting regular ticket)

Refund Period

One year from the day following the day of issuance of a certificate of double payment.
